Feel free to reach out to the MetaMask Team at any point with your questions!


üëÄ **ABOUT** 

Extend the functionality of **MetaMask**. The most popular wallet is now an extensible platform for permissionless innovation. Bring your features and APIs to MetaMask with Snaps.

A snap is a program run in an isolated environment that customizes and extends the wallet experience. We are looking for new and interesting use cases to modify MetaMask using Snaps.

Hello and welcome to the <#1018999236144156722> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314>

Feel free to reach out to the MetaMask Team at any point with your questions!

üëÄ **ABOUT**
**MetaMask** is the leading self-custodial wallet. The safe and simple way to access blockchain applications and web3. Trusted by millions of users worldwide.

**Linea** is a type 2 zero knowledge Ethereum Virtual Machine (zkEVM). A zkEVM replicates the Ethereum environment as a rollup and allows developers to build on it as they would on Ethereum mainnet. Linea allows you to deploy any smart contract, use any tool, and develop as if you're building on Ethereum. For users, this enables the experience and security guarantees of Ethereum, but with lower transaction costs.


üèÜ **PRIZE OVERVIEW**

**1. Build a dapp on Linea**
*We have $5000 max for up to 5 winners*

**2. Unity & MetaMask ‚ù§Ô∏è Builders**
*We have $1000 for one winner.*

**3. Build on MetaMask SDK**
We have $2k max for up to 2 winners ($1k each or $2k for one team).

Hey all ü¶ä 

We're introducing a work-in-progress ‚ú®**Snaps Simulator**‚ú®

Our main goal is to reduce the friction for devs trying to build snaps, so we've decoupled snaps execution from MetaMask and run the production snaps environment directly in the browser.

This means:
‚Äî **Hot-reloading snaps with no install screens**
‚Äî Easy-access to sending requests to all types of snaps handlers (no building a dapp required)
‚Äî Simulation of the MetaMask background and connection to the underlying node
‚Äî Simulation of Snaps Custom UI dialogs and transaction insights directly in the browser

We hope this will help anyone building a snap during the hackathon ‚Äî any feedback is much appreciated!

https://metamask.github.io/snaps-simulator/staging

Hello and welcome to the <#1018999236144156722> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314>

Feel free to reach out to the MetaMask Team at any point with your questions!

üëÄ **ABOUT**
A crypto wallet & gateway to blockchain apps

**Buy, store, send and swap tokens**
Available as a browser extension and as a mobile app, MetaMask equips you with a key vault, secure login, token wallet, and token exchange‚Äîeverything you need to manage your digital assets.

**Explore blockchain apps**
MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. You are always in control when interacting on the new decentralized web.

**Own your data**
MetaMask generates passwords and keys on your device, so only you have access to your accounts and data. You always choose what to share and what to keep private.

---

**Connect with MetaMask SDK**
MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect your blockchain-based applications to millions of MetaMask Wallet users via MetaMask SDK.
Our goal is to enable delightful user experiences for your apps that are built for diverse communities of users and use-cases, and compatible with various platforms.

**Linea**
A developer-ready zk rollup for scaling Ethereum dapps.
Projects across web3 are building with Linea to unlock new capabilities without compromising the security and developer experience of L1 Ethereum.


üèÜ **PRIZE OVERVIEW**

Hey, has anybody ever successfully built metamask from source and used it in a browser?
I've been trying to do that and successfully built, but it doesn't seem to actually work in the browser. Totally unmodified, except for the addition of my Infura key as per the docs.
Is there anybody on the team that I could ask some questions about this?

Hey hey Daniel! I‚Äôm on the Linea team - but I‚Äôll send your question to our MetaMask team

I can‚Äôt guarantee they‚Äôll be checking their messages given that it‚Äôs a Saturday and most of them are in Europe üò¶

Were you running these instructions? https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-extension

I can try it on my machine
sorry, didn't see your message in time
I just cloned the repo and followed the readme
with the exception that I ran yarn install before building
because otherwise you get an error from missing dependencies
but basically I was able to build once with "yarn dist" but the extension simply didn't work (it wasn't able to connect to dapps, it simply wouldn't open up)
later, I wiped the entire thing and cloned it again
repeated the procedure

and now it is freezing after: 
scripts:core:dev:standardEntryPoints: Bundle end: "primary"
a similar thing that people were reporting here: https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-extension/issues/14451
seems this was never resolved, but the issue was closed because there were other people who had builds failing for other reasons
I also tried "yarn start"
and "yarn start --platform=chrome" to just build for chrome, but all to no avail
the complete set of steps to reproduce is as follows:
1. git clone https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-extension.git
2. cd metamask-extension
3. cp .metamakrc.dist .metamaskrc
4. add the Infura ID to the INFURA_PROJECT_ID= on line 5 of .metamaskrc
6. yarn install
7. yarn start
I tried replacing step 7 with "yarn dist" and "yarn start --platform=chrome" and "yarn dist --platform=chrome" all with the same freezing at the same step in building, as outlined above.
note that the "yarn dist" variations seem to actually freeze at "Finished 'static:prod'" but I think thst's just because of the difference in verbosity between start and dist
also, as to the "where": I tried on WSL initially, then switched to Windows
in windows I just performed the equivalent actions as outlined above, but I just copied the file in step 3 in the file explorer

**Explore blockchain apps**

MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications. You are always in control when interacting on the new decentralized web.

**Own your data**

MetaMask generates passwords and keys on your device, so only you have access to your accounts and data. You always choose what to share and what to keep private.

**Connect with MetaMask SDK**

MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect your blockchain-based applications to millions of MetaMask Wallet users via MetaMask SDK.
